translation.text: Eastern Suburbs & Illawarra Line, South Coast Line - Major delays

Trains suspended between Cronulla and Sutherland due to a medical emergency at Redfern earlier. Buses are operating between Cronulla and Sutherland. Train stopping patterns may change at short notice. Additionally, buses may also supplement trains between Dapto and Bomaderry in both directions. Extended service gaps can be expected between Waterfall, Cronulla, Sutherland and Hurstville. Please listen to  announcements and check transport apps for the latest information.
Airport & South Line, Bankstown Line, Inner West & Leppington Line - Delays

due to a medical emergency at Redfern earlier and a trespasser at Cabramatta earlier. Frequent services are operating in both directions, however some stopping patterns may change at short notice. Please listen to announcements or check real-time apps for the latest information.

Delays due to urgent overhead wiring repairs at Clyde. 
Leppington services from the City will operate via Regents Park, from Lidcombe first stop Cabramatta. 
If you are travelling between Granville and Cabramatta, you will need to change trains at Parramatta or Cabramatta and join a T5 Cumberland Line service to complete your journey. 

Please allow extra travel time, check transport apps for latest updates.
North Shore Line, Northern Line, Western Line - Major delays

Major delays and gaps in services due to urgent overhead wiring repairs at Hornsby Maintenance Centre and a train requiring mechanical repairs at Flemington earlier. Please plan ahead, allow additional travel time and delay non essential travel if possible. Buses will supplement some trains between Hornsby & Berowra in both directions and may also supplement trains between Richmond & Blacktown and between Emu Plains and Penrith.

Buses are replacing trains between Bathurst, Lithgow and Springwood due to a landslide at Leura and infrastructure damage caused by recent bushfires. Due to the displacement of train services following the landslide at Leura and to ensure a frequent service, some trains will operate with four carriages instead of eight. At this stage, the line between Springwood and Mt Victoria is expected to remain closed until at least next week. Due to the extent of the damage caused by the bushfires, buses will continue to replace trains between Mount Victoria and Lithgow for an extended time. We will continue to keep you informed as repair works progress. Please listen to announcements, check Platform screens or Transport apps for updates.
Delays to some services due to urgent overhead wiring repairs at Hornsby Maintenance Centre earlier. Please allow extra travel time, check transport apps for latest updates.

Customers, due to Wynyard station upgrades the lifts from George Street to Concourse Level will be closed until July 2020.   During these works, Customers will be able use alternate lifts from Wynyard Station to Carrington Street and York Street accessed via Margaret Street.  For further information or assistance, Please follow station staff instructions, station signage or call Wynyard Station on 9224 2959.
The lift between the mezzanine level to concourse and to platforms 3/4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 4432.
The lift between the concourse and Harvey Road is temporarily out of service.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 1/2 is temporarily out of service.
The lift between platforms 1/2 and the concourse is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9224 2959.
The lift between the concourse and the western carpark on Bridge Street is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask station staff or call 9851 7244.
The lift between the concourse and the northern carpark on Railway Terrace is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask station staff or call 9851 7244.
Station Update - Blacktown, Central, Parramatta and more

Due to a landslide at Leura and damage caused by recent bushfires, buses are replacing trains between Springwood, Lithgow and Bathurst. Many Blue Mountains Line train services have been operating as 4 carriages instead of 8. We kindly ask that customers travelling to stations between Penrith and the city board T1 Western Line services to avoid congestion on Blue Mountains Line trains

The public toilets at Beverly Hills station are currently unavailable while major repairs take place. Temporary toilets have been provided and are located outside the station on Tooronga Terrace. These facilities can be accessed during staffed hours. We apologise for any inconvenience.

The public toilets at St James Station are closed while major works are taking place. Public toilets are located at the Elizabeth Street entrance to the right and in Hyde Park through the Macquarie Street tunnel up the stairs to the right. We apologise for any inconvenience.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info

Station Upgrade - Customers, due to Wynyard station upgrade the lifts from the concourse level to George Street will be closed until July 2020. Customers will be able use alternate lifts from Wynyard Station to Carrington Street and York Street accessed via Margaret Street.  For further information or assistance, Please follow station staff instructions, station signage or call Wynyard Station on 9224 2959.
